author: jdillon
msg: starting to refactor to remove the need to override maven's dependency scope to apply custom import types

author: saminda
msg: Updated to add index.html and index.jsp

author: jacopoc
msg: Break up of orderheader templates (for order confirm and order view screens) and the showPromotions template with multiple screenlets: this should improve the template readability and also make the customization much more simple.

Really thanks to Chris Howe for this work (OFBIZ-68): I had to manually apply the patch (many templates were changed after the patch was submitted, and in the patch there were some issues) and so I did something different from Chris' patch, however his work is now finally committed.
I've also removed some unused resources from the ecommerce component (a few entries in the controller, a screen definition and a template).
